name: sheep's head
steps: Carefully clean the sheep's head (over fire to remove hair, scrape, wash). Cut it in half.
Place the meat in the top of a couscoussier (steam cooking) with halved onions, whole garlic, the sprig of parsley and coriander, carrots and potatoes (if used), and salt.
Put water in the bottom of the couscoussier and bring to a boil. Steam for about 2 hours, or until the meat is very tender.
Serve very hot. Enjoy with salt and cumin.
